queries.query: SELECT l_returnflag, l_linestatus, sum(l_quantity) AS sum_qty , sum(l_extendedprice) AS sum_base_price , sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) AS sum_disc_price , sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount) * (1 + l_tax)) AS sum_charge , avg(l_quantity) AS avg_qty, avg(l_extendedprice) AS avg_price , avg(l_discount) AS avg_disc, count(*) AS count_order FROM bob_lineitem WHERE adddate(l_shipdate, INTERVAL 90 DAY) < str_to_date('1998-12-01', '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY l_returnflag, l_linestatus ORDER BY l_returnflag, l_linestatus;
